title: I’m the Villain’s Constellation but I’m Broke - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Chat Rooms   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Dungeons   God Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kind Love Interests   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Transmigration   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: 애송이수프
description:
I was the same, but the world had changed. 

[You are the new constellation of realm #381jh051.] 

It wasn’t enough to have entered the world of the novel, so I’m a constellation. 

To make matters worse, the guy who was stuck in the elevator with me was the problem. 

This guy was the enemy of mankind who turned black and destroyed the world in the original. 

‘Isn’t one of the reasons he turned black was because he wasn’t chosen by the constellations?’ 

Now that this has happened, I have no choice but to support Baek Tae-beom (백태범) and escape from here! 

[Skill: Activate support.] 

[Skill: Sponsorship has been canceled.] 

[The 10,000 coin sponsorship has been canceled.] 

[Reason: Lack of coins] 

[Current Coins: 0] 

Wait a minute. 

I think I’m screwed. 

[In original text] 

“Don’t disappear in front of me again, Hyung.” 

Baek Tae-beom smiled with bright yellow eyes like a beast. I couldn’t help but stare at him as if possessed by his fatally beautiful figure. 

“Then I really don’t know what will happen to me.”>
